title.rendered: Al-Hilal offers a Deal to Lionel Messi

content.rendered:
The soccer world is in shock when Lionel Messi was offered a massive deal of 400 million pounds a year by Saudi club Al-Hilal to join them. The source reported. With reports continuously coming in, it seems that the Lionel Mess will not continue with PSG. With his contract ending with PSG this summer the club & Messi will not be continuing their association.

Messi’s priority is to remain in European clubs, those who can afford him. If Messi decides to join the Al-Hilal club, he will be in the club competition again with Christiano Ronaldo, who joined Al-Nassr this winter.

(Read Also: PSG suspended Lionel Messi for 2 weeks without pay for an unauthorized UAE trip)

Amongst the many clubs who want to acquire Messi, his old club Barcelona, is still waiting on their financial reports to see if they can afford Messi. The talks are still ongoing between Messi’s father/agent Jorge & PSG but what outcome it holds, that remains to be seen.

With Ronaldo joining the rival club Al-Nassr, Al-Hilal have been pushing for Messi to join them. Another possibility is Messi joining Major League Soccers Inter Miami, Messi can entertain MLS offer. But he will do so as remaining in European clubs remains a priority for him.

The French club PSG has drafted a contract but without the sporting guarantees Messi asked for, to which he has still given no response. Returning to Barcelona still remains a priority as his family favours it too.
